name: RideTheChains
description:
Please download the game, HTML version is not fully supported! Introduction

We are a group of 4 developers, two programmers and two artists, and this is our submission for the "MashUp GameJam 2".

The team
  • Enzo Mannaert (Programmer)
  • Tom Stevens (Programmer)
  • Wouter De Moor (Artist)
  • Thomas Vansteelandt (Artist)
The game

We made a bullethell where the goal is to survive as long as possible and reach a great altitude! The theme of the gamejam was "Unconventional means" which is implemented by losing health over time and the only way of gaining health is to shoot enemies.
